tool_description: An api returns answer to any question possible. Includes 100+ unique answers designed for small to medium sized projects
name: Book of Answers
title: Book of Answers

api_list.name: Random
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://book-of-answers.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-of-answers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
